datasetDeIdentTypeOptions.label: Not Known
datasetDeIdentTypeOptions.description: No clear information available about the de-identification, if any, applied to the data.

datasetDeIdentTypeOptions.label: No De-identification
datasetDeIdentTypeOptions.description: Confirmed that no de-identification measures have been applied to the data set.

datasetDeIdentTypeOptions.label: De-identification Applied
datasetDeIdentTypeOptions.description: Some de-identification measures have been applied. Details should be described in comments and / or indicated in the linked boolean fields, or in separate documents.

datasetDeIdentTypeOptions.label: De-identification Applied & Primary Outcomes Re-assessed
datasetDeIdentTypeOptions.description: Some de-identification measures have been applied and are described. In addition the data has been re-analysed against the primary outcomes and the results described.

datasetConsentTypeOptions.label: Not Known
datasetConsentTypeOptions.description: No clear information available about consent for secondary use, or if any exists.

datasetConsentTypeOptions.label: No Explicit Consent
datasetConsentTypeOptions.description: No specific consent was given for the sharing of data or its re-use beyond the study in which it was originally collected.

datasetConsentTypeOptions.label: No Restriction
datasetConsentTypeOptions.description: No explicit restriction in the consent documents, though a broad consent to re-use is assumed, or this category is meaningless.

datasetConsentTypeOptions.label: General Research Use
datasetConsentTypeOptions.description: Consent indicates that use is allowed for general research use for any research purpose.

datasetConsentTypeOptions.label: Health Medical Biomedical Research
datasetConsentTypeOptions.description: Consent indicates that use is allowed for health/medical/biomedical purposes; does not include the study of population origins or ancestry, or the development of methods / algorithms (e.g. for ML)

datasetConsentTypeOptions.label: Disease Specific Research
datasetConsentTypeOptions.description: Consent indicates that use, for health / medical / biomedical research is allowed provided it is related to a specified disease (area). The disease (area) must be named or coded in the associated comments field.

datasetConsentTypeOptions.label: Consent Specified Not Elsewhere Categorised
datasetConsentTypeOptions.description: A descriptive statement regarding consent is available, but it does not fit into categories 1 - 5

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Contact Person
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: Person with knowledge of how to access, troubleshoot, or otherwise field issues related to the resource

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Data Collector
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: Person/institution responsible for finding or gathering/collecting data under the guidelines of the author(s) or Principal Investigator (PI)

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Data Curator
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: Person tasked with reviewing, enhancing, cleaning, or standardizing metadata and the associated data submitted for storage, use, and maintenance within a data centre or repository

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Data Manager
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: Person (or organisation with a staff of data managers, such as a data centre) responsible for maintaining the finished resource

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Distributor
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: Institution tasked with responsibility to generate/disseminate copies of the resource in either electronic or print form

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Editor
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: A person who oversees the details related to the publication format of the resource

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Hosting Institution
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: Typically, the organisation allowing the resource to be available on the internet through the provision of its hardware/software/operating support

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Producer
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: Typically, a person or organisation responsible for the artistry and form of a media product

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Project Leader
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: Person officially designated as head of project team or sub-project team instrumental in the work necessary to development of the resource

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Project Manager
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: Person officially designated as manager of a project. Project may consist of one or many project teams and sub-teams.

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Project Member
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: Person on the membership list of a designated project/project team

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Registration Agency
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: Institution/organisation officially appointed by a Registration Authority to handle specific tasks within a defined area of responsibility

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Registration Authority
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: A standards-setting body from which Registration Agencies obtain official recognition and guidance

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Related Person
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: A person without a specifically defined role in the development of the resource, but who is someone the author wishes to recognize

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Researcher
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: A person involved in analysing data or the results of an experiment or formal study. May indicate an intern or assistant to one of the authors who helped with research but who was not so `key‚Äù as `o be listed as an author.

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Research Group
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: Typically refers to a group of individuals with a lab, department, or division that has a specifically defined focus of activity.

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Rights Holder
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: Person or institution owning or managing property rights, including intellectual property rights over the resource

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Sponsor
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: Person or organisation that issued a contract or under the auspices of which a work has been written, printed, published, developed, etc.

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Supervisor
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: Designated administrator over one or more groups/teams working to produce a resource, or over one or more steps of a development process

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Work Package Leader
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: A Work Package is a recognized data product, not all of which is included in publication. The package, instead, may include notes, discarded documents, etc. The Work Package Leader is

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Other
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: Any person or institution making a significant contribution to the development and/or maintenance of the resource, but whose contribution is not adequately described by any of the other values for contributorType

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Study Lead
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: The individual who, if not the sponsor themselves, leads and co-ordinates the scientific and clinical activity within a clinical study, including co-ordinating the work of principal investigators at clinical sites. May be known as the Co-ordinating Investigator, the Study Chair, Study Director or similar terms.

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Clinical Trial Site Principal Investigator
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: The individual responsible for the safe conduct of a clinical trial at a particular clinical site.

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Clinical Study Manager
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: An individual responsible for the operational management of a clinical study. Similar to a Project Manager but a study manager is heavily involved in the management of data and data collection.

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Trial Sponsor
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: The organisation or individual that has the formal, legal role of a clinical trial sponsor, and is legally responsible for all aspects of a clinical trial.

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Sponsor Contact
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: An individual representing the sponsor and acting as an initial contact point.

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Public Contact
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: An individual designated as dealing with non-scientific queries from the public or press.

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Recruitment Contact
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: An individual designated as providing periodic updates on recruitment information or status, at all sites, usually for monitoring purposes.

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Study Funder
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: An organisation providing some or all of the additional funds required for the study.

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Funder Contact
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: An individual representing the funder and acting as an initial contact point.

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Independent Monitoring Committee Member
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: A member of a safety monitoring committee for a clinical trial, independent of the researchers and research activity.

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Medicinal Product Supplier
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: Organisation that provides one or more of the medicines investigated in a clinical study.

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Medical Device Supplier
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: Organisation that provides one or more of the medical devices in a clinical study.

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Logistics Support Organisation
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: Organisation that provides logistical input, e.g. provides a drug distribution service.

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Scientific Support Organisation
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: Organisation that provides scientific support, e.g. a national or international research network.

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Central Laboratory
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: Organisation that provides a central specialist laboratory testing facility..

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Central Imaging Facility
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: Organisation that provides a central specialist imaging or scanning facility.

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Clinical Organisation
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: Organisation, usually a primary or secondary health care organisation, that manages one or more of the sites where a clinical study takes place.

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Clinical Site
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: Organisation or location, usually in a primary or secondary health care organisation, that is one of the sites where a clinical study takes place.

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Collaborating Organisation
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: May be listed as a secondary sponsor, an organisation other than the lead sponsor involved in supporting a study.

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Sponsor Investigator
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: An individual with the role of sponsor as well as being the co-ordinating investigator for the study.

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Results Contact
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: The individual, occasionally organisation, to be contacted for further information on the study results.

datasetContributorTypeOptions.label: Research Group Member
datasetContributorTypeOptions.description: From PubMed, an 'investigator' is an individual (e.g., collaborator or investigator) who is not an author of a paper but is listed as a member of a collective/corporate group that is an author of the paper.
